message: This offer represents a fair split considering the decreasing value of money with each round. Please consider it.
I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. While I understand the money loses value each round, I believe this is a fairer distribution given the risks associated with delaying agreement.
Considering the inflation and aiming for a balanced approach, I propose a 60/40 split in your favor. This maintains a reasonable compromise while acknowledging the diminishing value of money.
